title: Maven Coordinates
statement: Fill the standard Maven coordinates for a library project.
explain: groupId usually reversed domain; artifactId is module name; version follows semver.

title: Dependency Scope
statement: Choose the correct Maven scope for JUnit 5 dependency used only during testing.

starterCode.java:
/* Expected Maven snippet:
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
  <artifactId>junit-jupiter</artifactId>
  <version>5.10.0</version>
  <scope>test</scope>
</dependency>
*/
class Notes { public static void main(String[] args){ System.out.println("test"); } }

explain: JUnit is only needed at test runtime, so use scope "test".

title: JUnit5 Basic Assertions
statement: Write a JUnit 5 test that asserts sum(2,3) == 5 using Assertions.assertEquals.

title: Parameterized Test
statement: Write a parameterized test with @CsvSource for reverse strings.

title: Mockito when/thenReturn
statement: Stub a dependency call with Mockito.when(...).thenReturn(...).
explain: Mock interfaces with mock(); define behavior with when(...).thenReturn(...).

title: Mockito verify()
statement: Verify that a method was called exactly once.
